text: ‘wijayakala mahesawaran mahathmiyata ethumiyage janathawage balaporoththu ishta karanna bari unahama ethumiyata witharak noweyi meka matath apitath api ganama wedanawak athi wana awasthawal thiyanawa mama wishwasha karanawa ethumiya kiyatawath nawatha yuddayak athi wenawatanam kamathi naha.

me anuwa (nawa nuwara para) adhiwegi marga haraha athurugiriya malabe margaya, lo lewal margaye ambaathale mansandhiya dakwa dirgha kerenu atha.meya aluthin idikarana marga kotas dekakin ha danata pawathina chandrika kumarathunga mawatha ek kirimen idikirima adala amathyanshaye balaporoththuwayi.mehi ek marga kotasak nawa nuwara pare chandrika kumarathunga mawatha mansandhiye sita (hamuda murapola asala) pahath bim sanwardhanaya kirime sansthawe ala margayata samagamiwa (mihindu mawatha haraha) athurugiriya malabe para dakwa idi kerena athara, anek marga kotasa danata wada katayuthu nathara kota thibena chandrika kumarathunga mawatha sita pahath bim sanwardhana sanstha ala margaya asalin lo lewal margaye ambaathale dakwa idikerenu atha.eya ee awata pradesha walata praweshaya labadena itha keti wikalpa margayak wana athara emangin danata malabe ha kaduwela mansandhi aashi්rathawa pawathna adhika wahana thadabadaya lihil kirimatada pitiwahalak wanu atha.mehi palamu marga kotasa wana chandrika kumarathunga mawatha mansandhiye sita athurugiriya malabe para dakwa kaduwela pradeshiya sabha bala pradeshayata ayath wana athara, lo lewal pare ambaathale dakwa wu kotasa ayath wanuye kotikawaththa, mulleriyawa pradeshiya sabha bala praªdeshayatayi.me marga manthiru dekak sandaha nirdeshitha pramanayata pulul karanu labana athara padika marga, wasi jala apawahana kanu paddhathi, aadi upanga sahithawa da idi kerenu atha.nagaraye gamanagamanaya pahasu kirima, wahana thadabadaya nisa siduwana adhika indhana dahanaya ha parisara dushanaya walaka ganima, payin gaman karannanta padika marga idikirima hethuwen owunge katayuthu kisidu apahasuthawakin thorawa kara ganimatama hakiwima, maga depasa pihiti idam wala watinakama shighra lesa ihala yama ha nagaraya alankara wimadiya memangin janathawata labena wasi walin kipayak bawada maha marga departhamenthuwe niladhariyek pawasiya.hethema me adahas pala kele kolonnawa pradeshiya sanwardhana sambandhikarana raswimata sahabhagiwa karana lada kathawakadiya.kolambaa disthrik parlimenthu manthri kolonnawa shri lanka nidahas paksha pradhana sanwidhayaka ha kolonnawa pradeshiya sanwardhana sambandhikarana kamituwe sabhapathi aar.

anathuruwa 7 wana da nittambauwa napagoda shri bodhimalakarama purana thripitakodaya maha piriwena asala di unawatune sumana nahimiyange da , mirigama shasanawardhana piriwen maha wiharasthanaye di sithaeliye chandananda nahimiyange anushasanayen da, maddepola shri bodhirajaramaye di mirihane dhammapala nahimiyange da dambaadeniya wiwidha sewa samithiye da, dambaadeniya shri wijayasundararama raja maha wiharaye di narangala siriniwasa nahimiyange da, bamunawela purana gal len rajamaha wiharaye di bulupitigama nandasara himiyange da, kurunagala yanthampalawa kohila pokuna wiharaye di kurunagala indarathana himiyange anushasana paridi ududumbara sobhitha himiyange daham desumak da sahithawa edina raya pahanwanathura da dayaka sabha kulangana samithi athulu aagamika sanwidhanawala pujopaharayata bandun wiya. 8 wana da udasana wariyapola shri wisuddharama wiharaya wenuwen kadhare pemarathana nahimiyange anushasanayen wariyapola nagaraye di da padeniya purana wiharaya abiyasadi katumuluwe sumanarathana nahimiyange anushasana paridi swechcha sanwidhana rasak saha padeniya shri sunanda maha widuhale widuhalpathithuman pradhana sisu daruwange da, ambaanpola udangoda shri bodhirajaramaye di nittambauwe dhammarama himiyange anushasana paridi pasal daruwan athulu dayaka pirisa da mahagalkadawala madagama shri jayabima thripitaka dharmayathana piriwen wiharasthanaye di da, thambauththegama kalaoya shri gangarama bauddha madhyasthanaye di padiyathalawe siwali himiyange anushasanayen da nikula sumanathissa nahimiyange anushasana paridi thalawa shri arahantha maha thalakawapi purana wiharaye di da, anathuruwa pallegama hemarathana nahimiyange anushasanayen ruwanwali maha sa radunge saha atamasthanadhipathi aacharya pallegama siriniwasa nahimiyange anushasana paridi jaya shri maha bosaminduge aashirwadaya labuha.

apa sinamakaruwage me nawa dhaneshwara aasthanaya nisa loka chithra kalawe eduwang munkge ‘moradima’ ha fransis bekange ‘mora dima’ yana wedanakari prakashanayan menma eewaye loka sinama anuwarthanaya lesa pawathunu sarji ayisanstayinge ‘batalship potempkin mora dima’ ha ehi sinhala sinama anuwarthanaya lesa pawathunu dharmasena pathirajage ‘moradima’ da sampurnayen nihanda wi yayi.
